guide_step1: When you first start using the mobile app (HypoThyroManage), you are expected to watch all videos and follow the recommendations. You can access these videos via the â€œVideos and Educationâ€ button on the home screen.
guide_step2: You should report your daily thyroid medication intake via the â€œDaily Medicine Trackerâ€ on the home screen.
guide_step3: Once a week, enter the symptoms you experienced into the â€œWeekly Reportâ€ section in â€œReports.â€
guide_step4: You are advised to rewatch videos related to your symptoms. You can find related information in the â€œSymptom Videosâ€ section.
guide_step5: You can ask questions anytime via the â€œAsk a Health Professionalâ€ section.
guide_step6: You can view your weekly symptom and medicine reports collectively from the â€œReportsâ€ section on the home screen.

steps.title: Watch Educational Videos
steps.desc: You are expected to watch all videos and follow the recommendations on first use. You can access them via the â€œVideos and Educationâ€ button.

steps.title: Report Medicine Intake
